description.en: Sinefy is a Turkish video streaming service for watching movies and TV shows in full HD.
description.tr: Sinefy, yüksek kalitede Türkçe dublajlı ve altyazılı dizi ve film izleyebileceğiniz bir internet sitesidir.
description.nl: Sinefy is een Turkse videostreamingdienst voor het bekijken van films en tv-programma's in full HD.
